column2: However, cosmesis scores across all cases were significantly higher for Radioguided localization of clinically occult breast lesions than Wire-guided Localization', with 76% of Radioguided localization of clinically occult breast lesions patients grading their results as excellent and 24% as good versus 52% excellent and 48% good when Wire-guided Localization' was used. The titanium seed used for Radiolabeled Seed Localisation has hitherto been traditionally used for delivering brachytherapy in prostate cancer and it combines the qualities of excellent strength, tissue tolerance and low radiation absorption.25 Feggi L, Basaglia E, Corcione S, Querzoli P, Soliani G, Ascanelli S, et al.
